body: * The table associated with the model.
Laravel Model: Table.description: Protected Table: The table associated with the model.

body: * The primary key associated with the table.
Laravel Model: Primary Key.description: Primary Key: The primary key associated with the table.

body: * Indicates if the model should be timestamped.
Laravel Model: Timestamps.description: Timestamps: Indicates if the model should be timestamped.

body: * The storage format of the model's date columns.
Laravel Model: Date Format.description: Date Format: The storage format of the model's date columns.

body: * The connection name for the model.
Laravel Model: Database Connection.description: Datebase Connection: The connection name for the model.

body: * The attributes that should be cast to native types.
Laravel Model: Attribute Casting.description: Attribute Casting: he attributes that should be cast to native types within your model.

body: * The attributes that are mass assignable.
Laravel Model: Mass Assignment (Fillable.description: Mass Assignment (Fillable): The attributes that are mass assignable.

body: * The attributes that aren't mass assignable.
Laravel Model: Guard Attributes.description: Guard Attributes: The attributes that aren't mass assignable.

body: * The attributes that should be mutated to dates.
Laravel Model: Dates.description: Dates: The attributes that should be mutated to dates.

Laravel Model: Boot.description: Boot: The "booting" method of the model.

body: * Scope a query to only include $1
Laravel Model: Local Scope.description: Local Scope: Query a local scope within your model.

Laravel Model: One to One Relationship.description: One to One: Define a One to One relationship within your model.

Laravel Model: Belongs To Relationship.description: Belongs To: Define a Belongs To relationship within your model.

Laravel Model: One to Many.description: One to Many: Define a One to Many relationship within your model.

Laravel Model: Many to Many.description: Many to Many: Define a Many to Many relationship within your model.

Laravel Model: Belongs to Many.description: Belongs to Many: Define a Belongs to Many relationship within your model.

Laravel Model: Has Many Through.description: Has Many Through: Define a Has Many Through relationship within your model.

body: * The attributes that should be hidden for arrays.
Laravel Model: Hidden.description: Hidden: The attributes that should be hidden for arrays.

body: * The attributes that should be visible in arrays.
Laravel Model: Visible.description: Visible: The attributes that should be visible in arrays.

body: * The accessors to append to the model's array form.
Laravel Model: Appends.description: Appends: The accessors to append to the model's array form.

body: * The relationships that should be touched on save.
Laravel Model: Touches.description: Touches: The relationships that should be touched on save.

body: * Indicates if the IDs are auto-incrementing.
Laravel Model: Incrementing.description: Incrementing: Indicates if the IDs are auto-incrementing.

Laravel Model: KeyType.description: KeyType: The "type" of the auto-incrementing ID.

body: * The number of models to return for pagination.
Laravel Model: PerPage.description: PerPage: The number of models to return for pagination.
